statements: SELECT * FROM trading_analysis;
SELECT trade_id, trade_symbol, trade_type FROM trading_analysis;
SELECT trade_date, trade_symbol, trade_volume FROM trading_analysis WHERE investor_sentiment > 3.5;
SELECT trade_id, trade_type, investor_sentiment FROM trading_analysis ORDER BY trade_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM trading_analysis WHERE trade_symbol = 'AAPL' AND trade_volume > 1000;
SELECT * FROM trading_analysis WHERE trade_id = 100
SELECT trade_symbol, trade_volume FROM trading_analysis WHERE trade_type = 'Buy' ORDER BY trade_volume DESC
SELECT trade_symbol, trade_volume, investor_sentiment FROM trading_analysis WHERE trade_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT trade_symbol, trade_type, trade_volume, investor_sentiment FROM trading_analysis WHERE trade_volume > 1000 ORDER BY trade_id ASC
SELECT trade_id, trade_date, trade_symbol, trade_type, trade_volume, investor_sentiment FROM trading_analysis
SELECT * FROM portfolio_management WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM portfolio_management WHERE investment_amount > 1000;
SELECT pattern_details FROM trading_patterns WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM portfolio_management ORDER BY investment_amount DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM portfolio_management WHERE investment_amount < 500;
SELECT * FROM portfolio_management WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM portfolio_management;
SELECT user_id, investment_amount FROM portfolio_management ORDER BY investment_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM trading_patterns JOIN portfolio_management ON trading_patterns.user_id = portfolio_management.user_id;
SELECT pattern_details FROM trading_patterns WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM portfolio_management WHERE investment_amount > 1000);
SELECT * FROM trades WHERE trade_id = 1;
SELECT trade_symbol, trade_volume FROM trades WHERE trade_volume > 100;
SELECT trade_id, trade_timestamp, trade_symbol FROM trades WHERE trade_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM investor_sentiment WHERE sentiment_score > 0.7;
SELECT sentiment_id, investor_id, sentiment_date FROM investor_sentiment WHERE sentiment_date = '2022-02-15';
SELECT * FROM trades WHERE trade_id > 100 ORDER BY trade_timestamp DESC
SELECT trade_symbol, trade_volume FROM trades WHERE trade_volume > 1000
SELECT trade_id, trade_symbol FROM trades WHERE trade_symbol LIKE '%AAPL%'
SELECT investor_id, sentiment_score FROM investor_sentiment WHERE sentiment_score > 0.7 ORDER BY sentiment_date
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_description FROM portfolio_strategies
SELECT id, pattern_name FROM TradingPatterns;
SELECT sentiment, sentiment_date FROM InvestorSentiment WHERE investor_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM PortfolioManagement WHERE id = 5;
SELECT analysis_type, analysis_results FROM AIAnalysis WHERE id = 10;
SELECT id, analysis_type, analysis_results FROM AIAnalysis ORDER BY analysis_type DESC;
SELECT * FROM TradingPatterns WHERE id = 1;
SELECT pattern_name, pattern_details FROM TradingPatterns WHERE pattern_name LIKE '%Trend%';
SELECT id, investor_id, sentiment FROM InvestorSentiment WHERE sentiment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM PortfolioManagement ORDER BY portfolio_name DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT id, analysis_type FROM AIAnalysis WHERE analysis_type IN ('Sentiment Analysis', 'Technical Analysis') ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM portfolio_management ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT portfolio_name, analysis_result FROM portfolio_management WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM trading_patterns WHERE pattern_name LIKE 'Pattern%' ORDER BY pattern_name ASC;
SELECT investor_name, recommendation FROM investor_sentiment WHERE sentiment_score > 0.8;
SELECT model_name, model_type, evaluation_result FROM ai_models WHERE model_type = 'Regression';
SELECT * FROM portfolio_management ORDER BY portfolio_name DESC;
SELECT pattern_name, strategy_recommendation FROM trading_patterns WHERE strategy_recommendation = 'Aggressive';
SELECT investor_name, sentiment_score, recommendation FROM investor_sentiment WHERE sentiment_score > 0.8;
SELECT model_name, model_type, evaluation_result FROM ai_models WHERE model_type = 'Regression' ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value, metric_description FROM performance_metrics ORDER BY metric_value DESC, metric_name ASC;
